docs.snippet: Golden State said Curry would probably miss at least the next two weeks with a sprained knee. It was, all things considered, relatively good news for the Warriors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Golden State said Curry would probably miss at least the next two weeks with a sprained knee. It was, all things considered, relatively good news for the Warriors.
docs.abstract: Golden State Warriors fans hold out hope that point guard Stephen Curry will recover from knee injury and return to game in time to help team secure second straight NBA championship.

headline.main: Stephen Curry Is Out, but Warriors’ Fingers Are Crossed
headline.print_headline: Curry’s Out, but Fingers Are Crossed for Warriors

docs.snippet: When Temba Bavuma became the first black cricketer to score a century for South Africa at this year's Cape Town test, a jubilant crowd erupted in celebration and commentators swiftly hailed it as a symbolic bridging of the racial divide....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Temba Bavuma became the first black cricketer to score a century for South Africa at this year's Cape Town test, a jubilant crowd erupted in celebration and commentators swiftly hailed it as a symbolic bridging of the racial divide.
